Blog.post: Due to structural problems in the deck, the pool is closed until further notice! What am I going to do? I'm so sad.

Duration: 31 minutes Distance: 1100 yards Workout: (yds) 200 free/warmup, 200 free, 100 medley, 300 kick (200 sizzor, 50 dolphin, 50 back), 200 pull (25 butterfly, 25 back, 25 breast, 125 free), 100 free/cooldown Weight: 211

I am probably the only swimmer who is slower when flipping than when not flipping. I tried to flip at every turn. I've improved in that I am no longer afraid to turn. But for most of the turns today, I turned all the way and stood up. I then realized that if I twist a bit, so that I come out of the turn on my side, I'm much more comfortable pushing off the wall than when I'm on my back. Once I made that change, I was doing better. It would help if I could get close enough to actually touch the wall on every turn, but I am making progress. Duration: 30 minutes Distance: 1000 yards Workout: 200 free/warm up, 300 free, 400 kick (50 dolphin, 50 back, 100 free)x2, 100 free Weight: 212 pounds

Well, if I'm going to lose weight, I have to diet. I'm starting today. On Monday, I'll start with Weight Watchers. I found my WW info. The meetings are on Tuesday, a swim day, so I probably won't be going to them. And at night, if I go to a meeting I should go to OA . It's so hard to get out at night with the kids so little. Our evenings are very rushed, and I want to spend time with my kids. That's one of the reasons I had kids.

Duration: 30 minutes Distance: 1000 yards Workout: 200 free/warmup, 200 free, Medley workout: (100 swim, 50 pull, 50 kick, 50 drill)x2, 100 free/cool down Weight: 214 ;( I managed to flip a few times.

Distance: 1100 meters Duration: 29 minutes plus 2 laps. I forgot to start my timer. Workout: 200 free/warmup, (50 sprint/free, 50 recover/free)x2, 200 pull breathe 7,3,5,3, 300 kick 100 sizzor, 50 dolphin, 50 back, 100 sizzor, 200 free/cool down. It's definitely getting easier. I'm going to try to swim 300 w/o stopping next time. I didn't flip. I'm not comfortable doing that in the big shared lanes. I really like swimming 50 m before turning better than 25 yards. Weight: 212 pounds - not bad considering my father's 85 birthday party was last weekend and I spent Sunday eating, uh, I mean, visiting with my brother.

The pool where I work is 50 meters by 25 yards. On Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, we swim 50 meters. On Tuesday and Thursday, we swim 25 yards, so they can have a water aerobics class in the shallow end. Duration: 30 minutes Distance: I forget. Workout: Swim: 200 free, 100 medley, kick: (50 free, 25 dolphin, 25 back)x2 plus 50 free, 50 free (front, side, back, side), 50 free, Pull: 100 medley, Swim: 100 medly, 100 medley (10, 8, 4), 50 free At least, I think that's what I did. Yuki helped me to learn to flip today, and I even managed to flip close enough to the edge to push off. We'll see if I can do it while swimming laps. Weight: 212.5 pounds :(

Duration: 30 minutes Distance: 1000 meters Workout: 200 warmup/freestyle, 200 free, 200 pull, 300 kick, 100 cooldown/free I'm getting in better shape. I think I will try swimming 300 free w/o stopping next time. My breathing really needs work. Whe pulling, I tried to stoke 9 for the first 50, 7 for the 2nd, 5 for the 3rd, and 3 for the last. I was able to do the occasional long holding of breathe, but mostly I had to breathe every 3rd stroke, my normal rate. Weight: 212 pounds :(

Distance: 800 meters Duration: 25 minutes Today, I was able to swim freestyle for 200 meters without stopping. I've really improved since last fall when I could barely swim 50 meters without feeling like I was going to die.

The local park district responded to the plea to open a pool for adult lap swimming at noontime. The LARPD opened up May Nissen Pool. Yah! Distance: 1300 m Time: 45 minutes Workout: 200 free/warmup, 200 free, 200 medley, 200 medley drill, 200 medley kick, 200 medley, (50 free, 50 back)/cooldown. Weight: no scale at this pool.

Okay, so I created a neopet, Stevie1220, the flotsam. Stevie really liked the chocolate coated mint bar, but she is bloated. And now, we've spent most of our points making a shop. I tried to read Stevie a book, the Magic Paw, but she said she likes books with pictures.
This selling chocolate business is good!
I bought Korbat 287 odert 175 lenny 350 seems to be selling for less so it's not in the store yet. aisha 240 chocolate covered mint bar 270 which seems to be sellng for 20
